backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor managing user profiles, phone lookups, presence, and call lifecycle with access control and signal storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, related frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their roles in authentication, calls, UI, and WebRTC logic.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode values, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling authentication, profile setup, loading states, and rendering the full layout.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginButton.t: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/features/branding/FoscoBran: Branding component displaying FOSCO logo and wordmark in small or large variants.
frontend/src/features/call/CallSurface.t: Core call UI component managing incoming and in-call states, wiring backend actions with WebRTC, and rendering video elements.
frontend/src/features/call/InCallControl: Renders call control buttons for mute, camera toggle, and ending a call with disabled state support.
frontend/src/features/call/IncomingCallP: Displays an incoming call card showing caller info with answer and decline actions.
frontend/src/features/call/OutgoingCallP: Provides UI to enter a phone number, lookup a callee, and initiate a call with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/features/call/useCalleeLook: Custom hook that resolves a phone number to a user principal, checks availability, and returns profile data with errors.
frontend/src/features/call/useWebRTCCall: Manages WebRTC call setup, media streams, signaling, and connection state with hooks.
frontend/src/features/layout/FacetimeOve: Wraps call UI in a fixed overlay with size variations based on fullscreen state.
frontend/src/features/layout/FoscoLayout: Main app layout coordinating header, movie window, call surface, and screen‑share or call controls.
frontend/src/features/layout/MovieWindow: Displays a screen‑sharing video stream or placeholder content with a fullscreen toggle.
frontend/src/features/layout/useFullscre: Hook providing fullscreen enter, exit, and toggle behavior with state tracking.
frontend/src/features/profile/PhoneNumbe: Form card allowing users to save their display name and phone number with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileDia: Dialog UI for viewing and editing caller profile with save mutations and validation.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/Screen: Renders start/stop screen sharing button and displays errors.
frontend/src/features/screenShare/useScr: Custom hook managing screen share stream, backend sync, and error handling.
Share button using Web Share API with clipboard fallback and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages authenticated/anonymous actor instance and invalidates dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAvailability.ts: Marks user availability on mount, unmount, and visibility changes via actor calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerProfile.ts: Profile fetch and save hooks using actor methods with react-query caching.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, loading, login, and logout handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of react-query hooks for call state, signaling, and screen-cast operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes and UI elements.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash‑query parsing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state, including requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for the FOSCO app.
